short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Store your Decred Politeia identity conveniently!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For use with Decred's proposal system, Politeia, use this extension to store your identity encrypted in your browser! 
https://proposals.decred.org - Politeia Proposal System
https://docs.decred.org - Learn More about Decred

Utilize from your Politeia User Account page!
Your identity keys will be synced *encrypted* to every chrome browser you are logged into with your google account and syncing extensions.

Conveniently import your identity into Politeia from anywhere!

Sure, you could use a password manager or keep a password locked text file somewhere on your file-system.. 
But with no password validation requirements, take back some sovereignty and use whatever length password you like with convenience directly in your browser. No account sign-up required!
